childs.dm4.notes.title: API Membership Requests
childs.dm4.notes.text:
A Note topic to collect all the API Workspace Membersip requests. This is helpful so "admin" can to an e.g. "Confidential" Workspace (when logged in).
This topic has all usernames associated which explicitly confirmed our API Terms of Service.

Admin, never remove topics related to this note manually.
